documentation.text:
@title PostDeliveryCrowdsale
 @dev Crowdsale that locks tokens from withdrawal until it ends.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "PostDeliveryCrowdsale: beneficiary is not due any tokens"

arguments.value: PostDeliveryCrowdsale: beneficiary is not due any tokens

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "PostDeliveryCrowdsale: beneficiary is not due any tokens"

documentation.text: @dev Withdraw tokens only after crowdsale ends.

@title PostDeliveryCrowdsale
 @dev Crowdsale that locks tokens from withdrawal until it ends.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "PostDeliveryCrowdsale: beneficiary is not due any tokens"

arguments.value: PostDeliveryCrowdsale: beneficiary is not due any tokens

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "PostDeliveryCrowdsale: beneficiary is not due any tokens"

documentation.text: @dev Withdraw tokens only after crowdsale ends.

devdoc.details: Crowdsale that locks tokens from withdrawal until it ends.

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

hasClosed().details: Checks whether the period in which the crowdsale is open has already elapsed.

returns._0: true if the crowdsale is open, false otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._0: the token balance available to buy.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: the address where funds are collected.

withdrawTokens().details: Withdraw tokens only after crowdsale ends.

devdoc.title: PostDeliveryCrowdsale
